We also ask that you complete our questionnaire so our pharmacy team can check that this product is suitable for you to buy. [](javascript:scrollToTop();) Managing pain has never been easier with our huge range pain medication options. Boots has the treatment to target the pain you're dealing with, to help you get back to doing what you love. We have a wide selection of different types of pain relief including ibuprofen gel and paracetamol tablets. Whether you need to relieve toothache pain or some back pain relief, find a way to ease discomfort that's right for you. And don't miss our brilliant range of pregnancy pain relief, including pain relief for labour, to make pregnancy a comfortable journey.
